item.title: Minecraft Bedrock Edition for PS4 product number in the wild
item.description: I know this has nothing to do with Linux, Fedora, Red Hat of Foreman, my typical topics on this blog, but my kid is looking for playing Minecraft on our PS4 with his XBox/Android/iOS friends and cross-play capability of Bedrock edition which is expected to appear on Playstation should do it. I’ve spotted product number (PN) PS719344100 and barcode (EAN) number 711719344100 with item entitled “Minecraft Bedrock PS4” across many e-shops across Czech Republic, Slovakia and Hungary as well as alza.
